definition: puffed up with vanity, the vestments and other insignia of a pontiff (especially a bishop)
details:
adjective
- puffed up with vanity
= synonyms: overblown
- denoting or governed by or relating to a bishop or bishops
= synonyms: episcopal
- proceeding from or ordered by or subject to a pope or the papacy regarded as the successor of the Apostles
= synonyms: apostolic
noun
- the vestments and other insignia of a pontiff (especially a bishop)
